channel.title: The rise and fall of the commercial software market
channel.description:
http://www.oreilly.com/programming/free/files/software-paradox.pdf
An interesting piece on the decline in revenues of traditional software licensing and the move to rental models.
I doubt it would surprise anybody here but it is useful to see some hard figures backing it up.
